resources.string:
- Two players card game
 - Cards of the Spanish playing cards
 Order cards:
 · 1
 · 3
 · Rest of the cards in decreasing order (12, 11, 10...)
 - Objective: win more points than the rival

- Every player has 3 cards in his hand
 - In every hand, each player uses one card and draws another one until all cards are used
 - The brisca is the card that marks which suit rules over the match
 - You can switch the brisca if you own the 7 of the same suit in your hand

- The winner of the previous hand is the one who starts playing in the next hand
 Who wins?
 · Wins the most powerful card with the same suit as the brisca suit
 · If there is not, wins the card more powerful that has the same suit as the first thrown card
 - The player collects the points of the won cards

Value of the cards:
 - 1 = 11 points
 - 3 = 10 points
 - 12 = 4 points
 - 11 = 3 points
 - 10 = 2 points
 - Others = 0 points
The game is not going to be saved! Are you sure that you want to leave?
